content: åŸºæœ¬ä½¿ç”¨ äº’æ–¥é” Mutex æä¾›äº†ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–¹æ³• Lock å’Œ Unlockï¼šè¿›å…¥åˆ°ä¸´ç•ŒåŒºä½¿ç”¨ Lock æ–¹æ³•åŠ é”ï¼Œé€€å‡ºä¸´ç•ŒåŒºä½¿ç”¨ Unlock æ–¹æ³•é‡Šæ”¾é”ã€‚ type Locker interface { Lock() Unlock() } func(m *Mutex)Lock() func(m *Mutex)Unlock() å½“ä¸€ä¸ª goroutine è°ƒç”¨ Lock æ–¹æ³•è·å–åˆ°é”åï¼Œå…¶ä»– goroutine ä¼šé˜»å¡åœ¨ Lock çš„è°ƒç”¨ä¸Šï¼Œç›´åˆ°å½“å‰è·å–åˆ°é”çš„ goroutine é‡Šæ”¾é”ã€‚ æ¥ä¸‹æ¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè®¡æ•°å™¨çš„ä¾‹å­ï¼Œæ˜¯ç”± 100 ä¸ª goroutine å¯¹è®¡æ•°å™¨è¿›è¡Œç´¯åŠ æ“ä½œï¼Œæœ€åè¾“å‡ºç»“æœï¼š package main import ( "fmt" "sync" ) func main() { var mu sync.Mutex countNum := 0 // ç¡®è®¤è¾…åŠ©å˜é‡æ˜¯å¦éƒ½æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆ var wg sync.WaitGroup // wg æ·»åŠ æ•°ç›®è¦å’Œ åˆ›å»ºçš„åç¨‹æ•°é‡ä¿æŒä¸€è‡´ wg.Add(100) for i := 0; i < 100; i++ { go func() { defer wg.Done() for j := 0; j < 1000; j++ { mu.Lock() countNum++ mu.Unlock() } }() } wg.Wait() fmt.Printf("countNum: %d", countNum) }

Go æ“ä½œ MySQL ä½¿ç”¨äº‹åŠ¡ Goè¯­è¨€ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸‰ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•å®ç°MySQLä¸­çš„äº‹åŠ¡æ“ä½œï¼š // å¼€å§‹äº‹åŠ¡ func (db *DB) Begin() (*Tx, error) // å›æ»šäº‹åŠ¡ func (tx *Tx) Rollback() error // æäº¤äº‹åŠ¡ func (tx *Tx) Commit() error ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç ï¼š // äº‹åŠ¡æ›´æ–°æ“ä½œ func transActionUpdate() { tx, err := db.Begin() if err != nil { if tx != nil { _ = tx.Rollback() } fmt.Printf("begin trans action failed, err:%v

", err) return } n1, err := result1.RowsAffected() if err != nil { _ = tx.Rollback() fmt.Printf("exec result1.RowsAffected() failed, err:%v
", err) return } sqlStr2 := "UPDATE user SET age = ? WHERE id = ?" result2, err := tx.Exec(sqlStr2, 20, 6) if err != nil { _ = tx.Rollback() fmt.Printf("exec failed, err:%v
", err) return } n2, err := result2.RowsAffected() if err != nil { _ = tx.Rollback() fmt.Printf("exec result1.RowsAffected() failed, err:%v
", err) return } if n1 == 1 && n2 == 1 { _ = tx.Commit() fmt.Printf("transaction commit success

content: C++ç®—æ³• #include <stdio.h> #include <string.h> #define MAX 10000 #define mod 10000 #define baselen 4 #define in(a) scanf("%d",&a) #define out1(a) printf("%d",a) #define out2(a) printf("%04d",a) typedef int type; struct bint{ type dig[MAX], len; bint(){len = 0, dig[0] = 0;} }; void by(bint a, type b, bint& c){ type i, carry; for( i = carry = 0; i <= a.len || carry; i++){ if( i <= a.len ) carry += b*a.dig[i]; c.dig[i] = carry%mod; carry /= mod; } i--; while( i && !c.dig[i] )i--; c.len = i; } bool input(bint& a){ type i, j, w, k, p; char data[MAX*baselen+1]; if(scanf("%s",data)==EOF)return false; w = strlen(data) - 1, a.len = 0; for(p=0;p<=w&&data[p]=='0';p++); while(1){ i = j = 0, k = 1; while(i<baselen&&w>=p){ j = j+ (data[w--] - '0')*k; k *= 10, i++; } a.dig[a.len++] = j; if(w<p)break; } a.len--; return true; } void output(bint& a){ type i; i = a.len - 1; out1(a.dig[a.len]); while(i>=0)out2(a.dig[i--]); } void give(type a, bint& b){ b.dig[0] = a%mod; a /= mod; if(a>0)b.dig[1] = a, b.len = 1; else b.len = 0; } int main() { bint a;int b,i;scanf("%d",&b);give(1,a); for(i=2;i<=b;i++)by(a,i,a); output(a);printf("\n"); return 0; }

content: C++ç®—æ³• #include <cstdio> #include <iostream> #include <cstring> using namespace std; int a[401], alen, b[401], blen, c[400], clen; char st[400]; int main() { int i, j, n, len; scanf( "%s", st ); alen = strlen( st ); for ( i = 1; i <= alen; i++ ) a[i] = st[alen - i] - 48; scanf( "%s", st ); blen = strlen( st ); for ( i = 1; i <= blen; i++ ) b[i] = st[blen - i] - 48; if ( alen > blen ) clen = alen; else clen = blen; for ( i = 1; i <= clen; i++ ) c[i] = a[i] + b[i]; for ( i = 1; i <= clen; i++ ) { if ( c[i] >= 10 ) { c[i + 1] = c[i + 1] + c[i] / 10; c[i] = c[i] % 10; } } if ( c[clen + 1] > 0 ) clen++; for ( i = clen; i >= 1; i-- ) { printf( "%d", c[i] ); } printf( "\n" ); return(0); }

content: C++ç®—æ³• #include<cstdio> using namespace std; int n; int sum; bool g[9][9]; bool wh[9]; bool wd[17]; bool wu[17]; bool bh[9]; bool bd[17]; bool bu[17]; void white(int h){ if(h==n){ sum++; }else{ for(int i=0;i<n;i++){ if(!g[h][i])continue; if(wh[i])continue; if(wd[i+h])continue; if(wu[(i-h)+n])continue; wh[i]=wd[i+h]=wu[(i-h)+n]=1; white(h+1); wh[i]=wd[i+h]=wu[(i-h)+n]=0; } } } void black(int h){ if(h==n){ white(0); }else{ for(int i=0;i<n;i++){ if(!g[h][i])continue; if(bh[i])continue; if(bd[i+h])continue; if(bu[(i-h)+n])continue; g[h][i]=0; bh[i]=bd[i+h]=bu[(i-h)+n]=1; black(h+1); g[h][i]=1; bh[i]=bd[i+h]=bu[(i-h)+n]=0; } } } int main(){ int i; int x; sum=0; scanf("%d",&n); for(i=0;i<n;i++){ wh[i]=bh[i]=0; wd[i]=bd[i]=0; wu[i]=bu[i]=0; for(int j=0;j<n;j++){ scanf("%d",&x); g[i][j]=(bool)x; } } for(;i<2*n;i++){ wd[i]=bd[i]=0; wu[i]=bu[i]=0; } black(0); printf("%d\n",sum); return 0; }

content: C++ç®—æ³• #include<iostream> #include<cstdio> #include<cstring> using namespace std; bool a[25][25]; bool v[25]; int n; bool dfs(int k) { if (k==n) { int sum=0; for (int i=1;i<=n;i++) if (v[i]) sum++; if (sum>n-sum) for (int i=1;i<=n;i++) if (v[i]) printf("%d ",i); return true; } if (v[k]==true) { int len=0,s[25]; for (int i=1;i<=n;i++) if (!a[k][i] && v[i]) { s[++len]=i; v[i]=false; } if (dfs(k+1)) return true; for (int i=1;i<=len;i++) v[s[i]]=true; } if (dfs(k+1)) return true; } int main() { scanf("%d",&n); memset(v,true,sizeof(v)); for (int i=1;i<=n;i++) for (int j=1;j<=n;j++) { int c; scanf("%d",&c); if (c) a[i][j]=1; else a[i][j]=0; } dfs(1); return 0; }

content: C++ç®—æ³• #include<iostream> #include<cstdio> #include<cstring> #include<cstdlib> using namespace std; char df[][10]={"ling","yi","er","san","si","wu","liu","qi","ba","jiu"}; char s[15]; int main() { scanf("%s",s); int lens=strlen(s); bool bk=false; for (int i=0;i<lens;i++) { int p,lendf; p=s[i]-'0'; if (p!=0) { bk=false; lendf=strlen(df[p]); if (s[i-1]-'0'==0) printf("ling "); if ((lens-i)%4==2 && p==1 /*&& s[i-1]-'0'==0 && s[i-2]-'0'==0*/ && i==0) { printf("shi "); continue; } for (int j=0;j<lendf;j++) printf("%c",df[p][j]); printf(" "); if ((lens-i)%4==2) printf("shi "); if ((lens-i)%4==3) printf("bai "); if ((lens-i)%4==0) printf("qian "); } if ((lens-i)%4==1) { if ((lens-i)/4==2) { bk=true; printf("yi "); } if (bk==false && (lens-i)/4==1) printf("wan "); } } return 0; }
